Topic Summary:
Vat and IT assessements, dispute between Appellant and Employer as to whether the payments were received on foot of a profit sharing
joint venture agreement, or subject to vat as they were  that the payments related to the provision of consulting
and training services by the Appellant
Tax Legislation: Section  111 and 113 of VAT Consolidation Act 2010 and Section  382 and 924 of the Taxes Consolidation Act 1997
